scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development API_URL=$(node -pe 'JSON.parse(process.argv[1] + process.argv[2]).tunnels[0].public_url.replace('http', 'https')' $(curl -s http://127.0.0.1:4040/api/tunnels)) doppler run -c dev -- nest start --watch
scripts.dev:env:start: NODE_ENV=development doppler run -c dev -- babel-node --extensions '.ts,.js' -r dotenv/config dev/start-env.ts
scripts.build:api:development: NODE_ENV=development API_URL=$(node -pe 'JSON.parse(process.argv[1] + process.argv[2]).tunnels[0].public_url.replace('http', 'https')' $(curl -s http://127.0.0.1:4040/api/tunnels)) doppler run -c dev -- webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:api:staging: NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c stg -- webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:api:production: NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c prd -- webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:webhook-stream:development: NODE_ENV=development API_URL=$(node -pe 'JSON.parse(process.argv[1] + process.argv[2]).tunnels[0].public_url.replace('http', 'https')' $(curl -s http://127.0.0.1:4040/api/tunnels)) doppler run -c dev -- webpack --config src/microservices/mews-stream/webpack.config.js
scripts.db:migrate:staging: NODE_ENV=development doppler run -c stg --command="set STAGE staging && babel-node --extensions '.ts,.js' -r dotenv/config dev/migrate/migrate-db.staging.ts"
scripts.db-es:migrate:production: NODE_ENV=development doppler run -c stg --command="set STAGE staging && babel-node --extensions '.ts,.js' -r dotenv/config dev/migrate/migrate-es.production.ts"
scripts.gen:key:staging: NODE_ENV=development doppler run -c stg --command="set STAGE staging && babel-node --extensions '.ts,.js' -r dotenv/config dev/keys/gen-api-key.ts"
scripts.gen:key:production: NODE_ENV=development doppler run -c prd --command="set STAGE production && babel-node --extensions '.ts,.js' -r dotenv/config dev/keys/gen-api-key.ts"
scripts.deploy:api:staging: yarn build:api:staging && AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=eu-west-1 NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c stg --preserve-env -- copilot svc deploy -n api -e staging
scripts.deploy:api:production: yarn build:api:production && AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=eu-west-1 NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c prd --preserve-env -- copilot svc deploy -n api -e production
scripts.deploy:microservices:staging: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=6144 NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c stg -- sls deploy --conceal --stage staging
scripts.deploy:microservices:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=6144 NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c prd -- sls deploy --conceal --stage production
scripts.deploy:webhook-stream:staging: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=eu-west-1 NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c stg --preserve-env -- copilot svc deploy -n webhook-stream -e staging
scripts.deploy:webhook-stream:production: yarn build:webhook-stream:production && AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=eu-west-1 NODE_ENV=production doppler run -c prd --preserve-env -- copilot svc deploy -n webhook-stream -e production
scripts.serve:api: yarn build:api:development && docker build -f ./Dockerfile -t hm/api . && docker run -p 5000:80 -d hm/api
scripts.serve:microservices: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=6144 && doppler run -c dev -- sls offline --stage development
scripts.serve:webhook-stream: yarn build:webhook-stream:development && docker build -f ./src/microservices/mews-stream/Dockerfile --build-arg build_dir=src/microservices/mews-stream/webpack -t hm/webhook-stream . && docker run -p 8000:80 -d hm/webhook-stream && WHS_OFFLINE=true yarn dev
